name: ignoranceisbliss
0:
”Alexa, open ignorance is bliss”
”Alexa, start ignorance is bliss”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ignorance is bliss
des:
Listen to this story with a timeless lesson.
IIT is a highly ranked federal school in Asian India, while several local colleges mushroom with an explosion of advanced tantric education. In this timeless story westernization and internationalization win, as common sense dictates immigration to a newer world of corporate opportunities and education.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
